response.original_title: Rob Sims Presents Fit Models Totally Exposed: The Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker Vol.2
response.overview: The Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker was filmed in one of the world's most notorious nest of unashamed sexual immorality: The Hedonist II nudist resort in Negril, Jamaica. This footage is completely uninhibited, unscripted and unbelievable! The "What happens in Hedonism II stays in Hedonism II" theory opened these girls up to fulfilling their wildest fantasies. Rob Sims photographed it, and we caught it all on film! This behind-the-scenes footage is full of everything you've ever dreamed of, full-frontal nudity and a variety of girls just being wild. These girls just can't stop taking off their clothes. Whether they are dripping wet in the ocean or rolling around in the sand, we got it all! You won't believe what happens on this DVD. It makes you wonder if these girls even knew they were on camera. Featured Models: Ahmo Hight, Marlene Burns, Janet Brumbaugh and Kelly Schreck!
response.title: Rob Sims Presents Fit Models Totally Exposed: The Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker Vol.2
